segments.text: I notice the angle of the kitchen, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, totally engrossed in her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet blasting water out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the sink and spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing fast at her feet, shiny on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets open wide with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy on a stool, reaching highâ€” whoa, it's tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, trying to balance cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's nearby, arm up, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secretive cookie grab is kind of thrilling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the whole setup screams accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a serene garden, birds maybe chirping outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm torn between amusement and worry here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Definitely not a dull moment in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
